item.title: Personal bike stored outside, 24th February
item.description:

item.title: Microwave, sink and recycling bags, 24th February
item.description:
Microwave and sink left outside the bins but then someone seems to be putting normal waste in recycling bags this morning the recycling bags were taken out the main bin and are now on the road posing risk to drivers and will likely be torn apart by fixes so harder to clean up tomorrow, please could you send someone as soon as possible:
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Carter Street, Walworth, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
